content.title: Bangpakok 9 International Hospital
paragraphs: Bangpakok9 International Hospital is a tertiary private care hospital located in Bangkok, Thailand. We are committed to providing healthcare with world-class standards. The Bangpakok Hospital Group has a total of 6 hospitals within the chain, all under the same high standard of management and dedication to customer care.Our specialist centers include; heart center, plastic surgery center, anti-aging center, aesthetic and skin center, orthopedic center, cancer center, rehabilitation center, dental center and and children’s center, to name but a few.

Only a 30-minute drive from Bangkok’s Suvamabhumi Airport, Bangpakok9 International Hospital is located a little south of Central Bangkok, in the area of Bangpakok, near the world-famous Chao Phraya River.Bangpakok9 International Hospital has physicians trained to the highest International standard, operating with the very latest medical equipment. Many of our doctors trained medicine abroad, and have obtained the finest medical education from chulalongkron Medical School, the most prestigious university in Thailand.This allows us to promote an international standard of healthcare at Bangpakok 9 International Hospital and earns us unconditional trust from our patients. .
Tell us what you are looking for and we will send you all the information…

content.meta_description: Bangpakok 9 International, the biggest plastic surgery center in Asia can help you improve yourself by looking better.
content.body_text: Home Procedures FACE SURGERY Alarplasty Cheek Reduction Chin Augmentation Chin Shaving Forehead Lift Full Face Lift Mini FaceLift Nose Implants Tip Rhinoplasty Nose Surgery Upper Eyelid Surgery Lower Eyelid Surgery BREAST SURGERY Breast Implants Breast Lift Breast Reduction BODY SURGERY Buttock Lift Buttocks Implants Liposuction Lipoplasty Tummy Tuck Vaser Hi Def Vaser Liposelection OTHER SURGERY Male to Female Female to Male Hair Transplants Hospitals Get Surgeon Feedback Bangpakok 9 International Hospital Bangpakok9 International Hospital is a tertiary private care hospital located in Bangkok, Thailand. We are committed to providing healthcare with world-class standards. The Bangpakok Hospital Group has a total of 6 hospitals within the chain, all under the same high standard of management and dedication to customer care. Our specialist centers include; heart center, plastic surgery center, anti-aging center, aesthetic and skin center, orthopedic center, cancer center, rehabilitation center, dental center and and children’s center, to name but a few. Only a 30-minute drive from Bangkok’s Suvamabhumi Airport, Bangpakok9 International Hospital is located a little south of Central Bangkok, in the area of Bangpakok, near the world-famous Chao Phraya River. Bangpakok9 International Hospital has physicians trained to the highest International standard, operating with the very latest medical equipment. Many of our doctors trained medicine abroad, and have obtained the finest medical education from chulalongkron Medical School, the most prestigious university in Thailand. This allows us to promote an international standard of healthcare at Bangpakok 9 International Hospital and earns us unconditional trust from our patients. . CAN WE HELP?
